itunes:title: #78: Dating After Heartbreak
title: #78: Dating After Heartbreak
itunes:author: Shena Lashey
itunes:subtitle: If you've had your heart broken and you're trying to determine if you even want to date again, we talked about three possible mindset shifts for you to consider to help you get there.    JOIN THE RECOVERY SCHOOL   REGISTER FOR OUR...
itunes:summary:
If you've had your heart broken and you're trying to determine if you even want to date again, we talked about three possible mindset shifts for you to consider to help you get there.
